    Class Description
    Board
    This board class is responsible for the methods that allow gameplay, accounting for all hits, misses and placements
    Game
    The Game Class serves as
    GameOverException
    The GameOverException is thrown if more moves are attempted after game play has ended.
    GridView  
    IllegalMoveException  
    IllegalPlacementException
    The IllegalPlacementException can be thrown if the user/player tries to place a ship where one already exists (or close to it) as well as if the user/player attempts to place a ship out of bounds.
    Main  
    MarkerType
    \
    Ship
    The Ship class is used to instantiate a new ship of each type for the player and the computer.
    ShipDirection
    This enum dictates the direction in which a user can place their ship.
    ShipType
    This enum contains the five different ships in our game.
    State
    This Enum is to determine the state in which the game is in at all times.
